label: ObservationObjectiveParameter
comment: A feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases for this observation objective.

datatypeProperties.comment: A type, expressed as text, for this observation objective parameter.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A measure of a value of the status for this specified parameter.
The indication of whether or not the value for this specified parameter is allowed.

referencedBy.comment: An applicable objective observation parameter of the interpretation result for this inspection result characteristic.
